title: How to Make Coffee on the Rocks

steps.headline: Place the ice cubes in the base of the tumbler glass.
Pour the sugar over the ice cubes.
Pour the coffee over the sugar and ice cubes.
Stir.
steps.description: Add a few drops of Angostura bitters if wished and garnish with a mint leaf. It's now ready to serve.

text: Place the ice cubes in the base of the tumbler glass.  Pour the sugar over the ice cubes.  Pour the coffee over the sugar and ice cubes.  Stir. Add a few drops of Angostura bitters if wished and garnish with a mint leaf. It's now ready to serve.
